titleStmt.title: SII 14.253: original edition by A. S. Ramanatha Ayyar
No. 253. (A.R. No. 41 of 1929.) ŚIVAPURI, TIRUPPATTUR TALUK, RAMANATHAPURAM DISTRICT. ON THE SOUTH WALL OF THE SECOND prākāra OF THE SVAYAMPRAKĀŚA TEMPLE.

summary.p: This record of the 21st year of Tribhuvanachakravartin Śrīvallabha registers a gift of land by Tiruchchiṟṟambalam-uḍaiyāṉ Tiruvēṅkaḍattāḻvān of Marudūr, a merchant of Aruviyūr alias Dēśi-uyyavanda-paṭṭaṇam for the kitchen expenses of the temple of Tiruttāndōṉṟi-uḍaiyār at Nṛipaśēkhara-chaturvēdimaṅgalam. The land had been purchased from a certain Māṟaṉ Koṟṟaṉ.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svastiśrī . tiripuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ śrīvallavadevaṟku yāṇṭu Irupattoṉṟāvatu keraḷaciṅkavaḷanāṭṭu brahmateyam nirupacekarac catu
timaṅkalattu tiruttāntoṉṟi Uṭaiyārkku māṟaṉ koṟṟaṉ pakkal tirumaṭaip paḷḷippuṟama Āka Iṉnāṭṭu Aruviyūrāṉa teci Uyyavanta paṭṭaṇa
ttu viyāpāri marutūruṭaiyāṉ tirucciṟṟampala muṭaiyāṉ tiruveṅkaṭattāḻvāneṉ Itdevaṟku tirumaṭaippaḷḷippuṟamāka vilaikoṇṭu
kuṭutta pūmiyāvatu . Ivvūr melpiṭākai palakai teṟippāṉāṉa tiyāka kuṭaiyeri kuḷamum kuḷavāyum Akappaṭa vaḷaiyil cuṟṟu muṟṟilu muṉṟat to
ṉṟu vilaidravyattilum Iṟaidravyattilum muṉṟat toṉṟu kuṭuttu Itdevar Āticaṇṭeśvaradevarkku tirumaṭaippaḷḷippuṟamāka cantrātittavaṟ ce
lvatākak koṇṭu kuṭutteṉ tirucciṟṟampalamuṭaiyāṉ Āḻvāṉeṉ . Itu paṉmāheśvara rakṣai
Digital edition of SII 14.253 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
